metadata.description: From a world where society as we know it has crumbled and humanity has been irrevocably changed, she comes -- the all-new, all-different SAVAGE SHE-HULK! But now, a deadly mission has brought her to our world. What terrible secret does this gamma-irradiated beauty bare? And is she friend or foe, Inhuman or mutant, Avenger, Defender...or Invader?
metadata.name: All-New Savage She-Hulk
